Name: Skeleton Warrior
Lore: The clack-clack-clack of his bones against the dungeon floor is the most terrifying sound you have ever heard. That's not because he is a horrifying creature of undeath, but because you know that in his bag of rattling bones are the missing pieces of your "Dwarf Fortress" LEGO set. He took it, and he has no intention of giving it back.
Lose: Break and/or Discard a total of 2 cards

Name: Golem Brute
Win: Draw 3 Quest Cards and 1 Tavern Card
Lose: Discard 1 Anvil Card and Place 2 Monster Cards from your Stash to the bottom of their respective Monster Decks

Name: Cursed Mirror
Lore: A shimmering mirror blocks your path, showing a twisted reflection of yourself. The reflection challenges you to single combat. If you win, shatter the mirror and gain a Magic Item. If you fail, lose 1 Strength permanently as your reflection steals part of your essence.

Name: Gambling Goblin
Lore: A crafty goblin offers to play a game of chance. Pay 2 Gold to play. If you win, gain 4 Gold and a Random Item. If you lose, lose all your Gold but gain the goblin's Lucky Charm (+1 to all future dice rolls this game).
Win: Gain 4 Gold and a Random Item
Lose: Lose all Gold but gain Lucky Charm (+1 to all dice rolls)

Name: Weeping Statue
Lore: An ancient stone statue weeps tears of liquid silver. Test Willpower. Success: Drink the tears and permanently increase one attribute by 1. Failure: Discard your most valuable possession and lose your next turn.
Skill Description:
Roll, 1-3} Discard most valuable possession and lose next turn

Roll, 4-6} Increase one attribute by 1.

Name: Sphinx Riddle
Lore: A majestic sphinx blocks the pass, speaking in riddles. Answer correctly to pass and gain 2 Experience. Fail and face the sphinx in battle (Strength 15, 3 Lives).

Name: Merchant of Souls
Lore: A hooded figure offers to trade memories for power. Trade an Experience point for a powerful artifact, or a Curse for full healing. Only visit once per game.
Win: Gain powerful artifact or full healing

Name: Dancing Flames
Lore: Enchanted flames dance in a circle, whispering secrets. Test Craft. Success: Learn a new spell. Failure: Lose 1 Life but gain immunity to fire-based attacks.
Skill Description: Lose 1 Life and earn a new spell

Name: Lonely Dragon
Lore: An ancient dragon sits alone in a cavern. Offer a story to befriend the dragon and receive a Talisman, or attempt to steal treasure while it sleeps (Risk: If caught, face its wrath).
Lose: Face dragon's wrath if caught stealing

Name: Time-Lost Knight
Lore: A noble knight from a bygone era challenges you to honorable combat. No magic or spells allowed. Victory grants the Knight's Blessing: +2 to all Honor-based encounters.

Name: Wishing Well of Sorrows
Lore: A deep well surrounded by bones. Make a wish by discarding half your Gold. Roll 1 die: 1-2 wish backfires, 3-4 nothing, 5-6 wish granted in an unexpected way.
Skill Description: Make a wish by discarding half your Gold. Roll 1 die: 1-2 wish backfires, 3-4 nothing, 5-6 wish granted in an unexpected way.

Name: Shadow Assassin
Lore: A silent killer emerges from the darkness, blades glinting.

Name: Ancient Oak
Skill Description: The tree offers wisdom to those who listen. Roll 1 die: 1-3) Gain 1 Lore, 4-6) Heal 1 Life.

Name: Fire Sprite
Lore: A mischievous sprite dances in flames, cackling.

Name: Wandering Merchant
Skill Description: You may buy or sell any number of Items. If you buy, pay 2 Gold per Item. If you sell, gain 1 Gold per Item.

Name: Frost Wolf
Lore: A massive wolf with icy breath blocks your path.
Lose: Lose 1 Life and skip your next turn.

Name: Enchanted Fountain
Skill Description: Drink from the fountain: Heal 2 Life or gain 1 Spell card. You may only choose one.

Name: Bandit Captain
Lore: A notorious bandit leader demands your valuables.

Name: Mysterious Portal
Skill Description: Step through the portal: Roll 1 die. 1-2) Move to any Place, 3-4) Gain 1 Spell, 5-6) Lose 1 Life.

Name: Goblin Swarm
Lore: A horde of goblins rushes you, shrieking.

Name: Wishing Stone
Skill Description: Make a wish: Roll 1 die. 1-2) Nothing happens, 3-4) Gain 1 Gold, 5-6) Gain 1 Spell.

Name: Dire Bat
Lore: A giant bat swoops from the shadows, fangs bared.

Name: Crystal Grotto
Skill Description: You may search for treasure: Roll 1 die. 1-2) Nothing, 3-4) Gain 1 Gold, 5-6) Gain 1 Magic Item.

Name: Swamp Hag
Lore: A cackling hag emerges from the muck, casting curses.
Lose: Lose 1 Life and gain a Curse.

Name: Runestone
Skill Description: Touch the stone: Roll 1 die. 1-2) Lose 1 Life, 3-4) Nothing, 5-6) Gain 1 Strength.

Name: Ironclad Knight
Lore: A knight in full plate armor challenges you to a duel.

Name: Moonlit Pool
Skill Description: Drink from the pool: Heal 1 Life or gain 1 Spell. You may only choose one.

Name: Cave Troll
Lore: A hulking troll blocks your way, swinging a massive club.

Name: Witch's Cauldron
Skill Description: Drink the brew: Roll 1 die. 1-2) Lose 1 Life, 3-4) Gain 1 Spell, 5-6) Heal 2 Life.

Name: Bandit Ambush
Lore: A group of bandits leaps from the shadows, weapons drawn.

Name: Sacred Grove
Skill Description: Rest here: Heal 2 Life or gain 1 Lore. You may only choose one.

Name: Fire Drake
Lore: A small but fierce dragon breathes fire at you.

Name: Enchanted Lantern
Skill Description: Use the lantern: Ignore the next darkness-based encounter you face.

Name: Forest Sprite
Skill Description: The sprite offers guidance: Move to any Forest space or gain 1 Lore.

Name: Haunted Armor
Lore: An empty suit of armor lurches to life, swinging a spectral blade.

Name: Mystic Obelisk
Skill Description: Touch the obelisk: Roll 1 die. 1-2) Lose 1 Life, 3-4) Gain 1 Spell, 5-6) Gain 1 Strength.

Name: River Serpent
Lore: A massive serpent rises from the water, hissing.

Name: Wandering Sage
Skill Description: The sage offers wisdom: Gain 1 Lore or draw 1 Spell card.

Name: Obsidian Idol
Skill Description: Pray at the idol: Roll 1 die. 1-2) Lose 1 Life, 3-4) Gain 1 Gold, 5-6) Gain 1 Spell.

Name: Dire Wolf
Lore: A huge wolf with glowing eyes stalks you.
Lose: Lose 1 Life and skip your next turn.

Name: Fey Circle
Skill Description: Dance with the fey: Roll 1 die. 1-2) Lose 1 Life, 3-4) Gain 1 Lore, 5-6) Gain 1 Spell.
